attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A new "Broadband Tax" of 50p per month has been proposed by Government for everyone with a fixed line telephone.

It has been said that this tax is needed for to make more high speed networks available across the country and the tax will raise pprox £175m p/a however like our Green Taxes and Road Tax it is doubtful all the tax would be used for the purpose it was put in place for and therefore it is just another stealth tax that will go the treasury and wasted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
